CustomField.description: This field tells you if the account is a Time Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Time_Builder__c , "Own It"), ISPICKVAL(Time_Builder__c, "Own Partial"), ISPICKVAL(Time_Builder__c, "Billing Paused")),"Time Builder Customer","Non Time Builder Customer")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tells you if the account is a Time Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.label: Time Builder Customer Status
